| Symptom | Concern |
|---|---|
| Pallor | Possible significant anemia/blood loss |
| Rapid heart rate (tachycardia) | Body compensating for low blood volume |

- Vital signs monitoring

**You may not be able to. He is a competent adult and he has the right to make his own medical decisions, even ones you disagree with.**
